EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2017-10-10-Charlotte Community Appreciation.ES-2017-09-26-Charlotte-Invite-1
EmailTemplate.subject: SAVE THE DATE: Turbonomic Community Appreciation Kings vs Canadiens
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/los-angeles-community-appreciation-kings-v-canadiens/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
On behalf of Steve Corndell, Vice President at Turbonomic, we are pleased to invite you to an exclusive event on October 18th, as the Los Angeles Kings take on the Montreal Canadience.
We are expecting a fantastic summer evening filled with food, drinks, and of course, baseball. We hope you will accept this invitation to join us, learn more about Turbonomic, and network with your peers in the technology industry.
Los Angeles Kings vs Montreal Canadiens <[[https://turbonomic.com/los-angeles-community-appreciation-kings-v-canadiens/]]>
Where: Staples Center 1111 S. Figueroa, Los Angeles, CA 90015 Wednesday, October 18th 7:30pm
<[[https://turbonomic.com/los-angeles-community-appreciation-kings-v-canadiens/]]>
We hope you'll be able join us,
The Turbonomic Team
